channel.title: 317 - Delta [Items fit in right spot] Rep++
channel.description:
Hey all,
I copy'd my statius int codes and renamed it and changed the id, That all works. Exept when i try to wear it it comes in the wrong spot (Where your weapon is suppose to be) So i went on to item.java and placed the statius id's in the right places (Statius platebody by platebody[] etc)
But of the 3 statius items only the platelegs fits right. The rest just go to the weapon slot again.. I am pretty sure i added it in the wrong place becaus i placed it next to the current statius id's that does work.
Rep ++ for the one who can help me.
YouriDudock

item.title: 317 - Delta [Items fit in right spot] Rep++
item.dc:creator: @youridudock youridudock
item.description:
@youridudock wrote:

[quote=“iamminesmith, post:3, topic:400999”]1. you must go into your item.java of your source
2. find the ids of the items
3. put the item id in the correct spot and Ta-Da[/quote]

I did that, I am not stupid.

Delta uses two arrays for body type items, namely body and platebody.

body is what determines if an item is worn in the body slot.
platebody is what determines if the model clips over the player’s arms or not, and should be used only for body gear that has a prominent arms part on their model.

Adding to the platebody array alone will not assign the item to your body slot. In the case of Statius’ platebody, you should add the ID to both arrays.

I will try now, Thanks!

Edit : It worked lmao I probs had a black out becaus i didnt saw those 2 words at the first time.

Rep ++ as promis

Read full topic
item.source: 317 - Delta [Items fit in right spot] Rep++

item.title: 317 - Delta [Items fit in right spot] Rep++
item.dc:creator: @Oh-Noes Oh-Noes
item.description:
@Oh-Noes wrote:

Delta uses two arrays for body type items, namely body and platebody.

body is what determines if an item is worn in the body slot.
platebody is what determines if the model clips over the player’s arms or not, and should be used only for body gear that has a prominent arms part on their model.

Adding to the platebody array alone will not assign the item to your body slot. In the case of Statius’ platebody, you should add the ID to both arrays.
